amendment.description: To include other Federal departments and agencies in an evaluation of potentially duplicative green building programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3056 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3056 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Flake to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3056 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
